pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data Science for Psychologists // All data sets required for the examples and exercises in the book "Data Science for Psychologists" (by Hansjoerg Neth, Konstanz University, 2019), freely available at https://bookdown.org/hneth/ds4psy/. The book and course introduce principles and methods of data science to students of psychology and other biological or social sciences. The 'ds4psy' package primarily provides datasets, but also functions for graphics and text-manipulation that are used in the book and its exercises.
